Slimming Menu

[vc_column_text]

Our slimming menu is designed such that you can eat more, not less! The key is to develop a healthy, relatable food menu that ensures you stay well within your specified calorie limits. No hard to follow rules here, just really nutritious meals customised to leave you fuller yet slimmer!

[/vc_column_text]

Our benefits

Why customers choose us

[vc_column_text]

Enjoy nutritious food that is free from added preservatives or colors, refined sugar, diary, gluten, or just about anything artificial. Anybody who wants to adopt a healthy diet be it fitness enthusiasts, vegans, lactose intolerant, nutrition lacking etc, can easily adapt to our food plans.

[/vc_column_text]

  • ORGANIC INGREDIENTS
  • VARIETY IN TASTES
  • INNOVATIVE HANDMADE RECIPES
  • NO FRYING
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” bg_color_select=”gray”][vc_column]

Nutrition plans

Choose Your Nutrition

  • Slimming Menu
  • Muscle Gain Menu
  • Balanced Menu
  • Corporate Menu

Slimming Menu

800-1000 kcal

Our slimming menu is designed such that you can eat more, not less! The key is to develop a healthy, relatable food menu that ensures you stay well within your specified calorie limits. No hard to follow rules here, just really nutritious meals customised to leave you fuller yet slimmer!

/Mon-Sat WEEKLY
Order nowView menu

Muscle Gain Menu

1400-2000 kcal

Contrary to a slimming menu, to build muscles you have to be on a calorie surplus menu that ensures your efforts at the gym are supported by the foods you consume. Carefully designed to meet your bodybuilding goals, our muscle gain meal plans are rich in proteins, fibres and every other supplement you need to build muscle mass.

/Mon-Sat WEEKLY
Order nowView menu

Balanced Menu

1200-1400 kcal

A healthy body needs all the vital nutrients in the right proportion. Our balanced food menu has meals emphasizing on carbs, veggies, fruits, fibres, etc while keeping the protein intake high and fat low, thereby guaranteeing your overall fitness and wellness.

/Mon-Sat WEEKLY
Order nowView menu

Corporate Menu

1200-1600 kcal

Always relying on the unhealthy food options from your office cafeteria? Don’t let your time constraints prevent you from having a wholesome, nutritious lunch or snack during office hours. Our office menu has light, filling and energy popping options to keep you going!

/Mon-Fri
Order nowView menu

Testimonials

What our clients say

Fabeat transformed the way I looked at diet food. Initially I found the thought of switching to healthy food variants intimidating because of their bland tastes but the flavorsome and nutritious recipes by Fabeat ensured I could have delicious food without having to compromise on my health and nutrition goals!

Anagha Ragunath

While playing football and weight training, getting protein rich diet without much carbs was always a problem. Cooking during a busy work schedule was not easy and not many restaurants offered healthier food options. Fabeats has solved this pain point and offers healthy clean food at affordable rates. I really appreciate the variety they offer and is my go to place for meals now!

Zameel

For the longest time I have wanted to switch to healthier food options but I didn’t know where to begin. Fortunately I stumbled upon Fabeat and their wonderfully enriching yet delicious meal plans have helped me flush the toxins out of my life. Now I have fresh, organic and nutritious food delivered at my doorstep and I eat guilt free!

Shamsudheen

Thank you Fabeat for helping me meet my fitness goals seamlessly! I could meet my resolutions to slim down and work towards toning my body without compromising on the quantity or taste of food! The variety available at Fabeat makes sure you don't have to keep eating the same food every day!

Steffy Jaya John

As someone who prefers snacking to having full meals, I have always worried about consuming the right snacks that ensured my body received the right amount of nutrition. The sheer variants of snacks available in Fabeat got the impulse snacker in me really excited! And really delicious too! Fabeat has become an integral part of my food habits now!

Harshan
